attributes.action: introduce Free Health Care at the point of need to all UK Citizens over the age of 60
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I just feel that if a small country like Scotland etc can afford to giver their Elderly Free Health Care at the point of need then so should the UK, I think it's a disgrace that the elderly have to sell their homes and use their savings to pay for Care.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "introduce Free Health Care at the point of need to all UK Citizens over the age of 60."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15402.asp

Prime Minister's Office
